author: Dave Rittner
comment: I've downloaded (and paid for) several watch faces for my LG Urbane. This isn't the most elegant of the bunch, but I just keep coming back to this one. It's easy to use, easy to read, and clearly displays lots of useful information. It's easy to look at and fairly attractive. The only reason i didn't give it five stars is because sometimes when I'm trying to get to my apps list, it deploys its list of current info. It's good info, but when I'm trying to get to settings, well...fix this and it's five stars.
title: I just keep coming back to this one

author: Rashmin Patel
comment: The customization options and watchface itself looks nice and elegant. One thing I don't like is the word "Combo" written in middle. It sticks out too much. Maybe making it more dimmer or fading it would make it better.
title: Nice looking!

author: Fraiser Thomas
comment: Great range of options that are FREE, for now. Finally able to make the watch face that I want. **minor negative** UI flashes on touch eg when swiping up or pressing for more information on weather etc
title: Brilliantly Customisability

author: Milo Reddy
comment: Looks good but apparently some services it requires are not yet available. As a result it cannot reach my Smartwatch. I'll hold onto it in the hope there is an update to fix the issue, more stars then.
title: OK but. . .

author: Jose R. Lopez
comment: This made me fall in love with my smartwatch all over again.  The level of customization provided by the developer here is insane.  I love this, thank you for making it available to us.
title: Nothing short of fantastic

author: Salman Halim
comment: I would have given 5 stars. But there is a slight glitch on moto 360. On tilt to wake it flickers while turning on display. Developers, kindly fix this issue.

author: Andrew Griffiths
comment: This is an awesome watch face - love the options Only thing preventing 5* is that the steps don't seem to be pulling correctly and there is no option to have the steps on the face... otherwise it's awesome

author: max goh
comment: The flash each time we swipe or touch feel annoying and cheap ux...else is perfect, anyhow this is full 5 stars. Nice!
title: The flash spoil the ux

author: Chuck Hansen
comment: This watch face strikes a very nice balance between having enough customization options and being overly cluttered.
title: Just enough...

author: Achint S
comment: I love this app and gave it a 5 star rating. But it still keeps prompting to be rated on the Android wear app. Irritating. Please fix this.
title: Nagware

author: Khanh
comment: If you can make a clock handle transparent/thin enough to not cover the battery/date,  will 5 star.
title: Nice but...

author: Christopher Boss
comment: The step counter is way off and I'm not even sure it's updating. Customizations are nice and the faces look great regardless. Would like the option to add steps, if ever fixed, to the actual watch face.

author: Satheesh S
comment: Very beautiful watch face with lot of useful options.. i would say after searching tons of watch face..this is the best. Highly recommended.  Please include more watch faces with lots of customization.  Keep up the good work :)
title: The most customizable watch face ever

author: Mark Still
comment: Shame about the flash everytime you touch the screen.
title: Nice app

author: Alex Leung
comment: Tapping on it causes a flash which disrupt the feel. Otherwise excellent.
title: Elegant watchface with a minor flaw

author: Paul Koch
comment: A fantastic job by the designer. A Splendid job indeed and at no cost. It's something you rarely find. This is a must for your watch face collection!

author: john jairo espinosa
comment: Better than expensive watch faces apps thank you
title: Best one

author: Joseph Bery
comment: The combo is amazing but you can make watch faces that you will have to pay for other wise so just use this instead of buying all the faces

author: Lucas Kara
comment: Very nice little app here! Zuhanden makes some of the best watch faces for sure! Well done man
title: Nice!

author: john Piazza
comment: No digital face even with paid version. Also no free premium version for limited time as mention.
title: No digital face

author: Andri Yatim
comment: Great little interactive watch face for round screen devices. Most of the info you need right where it's needed.

author: Jacob Hesselschwardt
comment: Among the best watch face apps available.
title: Loving It

author: stephen shavers
comment: Plenty of watch face options. Customization is fantastic!
title: Nice options

author: Hedi Fezai
comment: Really good job. Just if possible separate items between active mode and dimmed mode.
title: Awesome

author: Brian Batronis
comment: I've been looking for clean functional watch face. This app delivers.
title: Clean and Functional

author: Stanley Hutchins
comment: Need more options like remove hands and more colors

author: Carlton Mackie
comment: Very good although, would be nice if this app had a step counter
title: CM

author: Jose Oquendo
comment: It us the most beautiful watch face ever downloaded. Good
title: Nice looking watch face

author: Elizabeth Rosenberry
comment: Beautiful watch face. Just wish the background would stay lit in ambient mode.

author: Bogdan Ghitescu
comment: Temps are only in Fahrenheit. Please add Celsius temp values.
title: Great wface. Thanks!

author: Arun Raj
comment: Nice and compact view of dial makes this face simple and good.
title: Looks cool

author: Trina B.
comment: No way to update weather. Uninstalled.

author: Burke D
comment: Works great on galaxy s7 and Huawei smart watch. Looks good too.
title: Works great

author: Sascha
comment: Even better then the last one.. WHOO HOOOO

author: Derek Hollier-Day
comment: Simple, customisable and feature filled.  Did I mention,  free?
title: Best free watch out there

author: Roman Hnatiuk
comment: Adding steps counter would make it perfect.
title: Good face

author: Behzad Shabani
comment: I love this one very much.
title: Good watch face

author: ramon addarich
comment: A OK!!!
title: Ram

author: Peiman sh
comment: best watch face, seriously, i tried alot

author: Nate King
comment: Nice clean watch faces with great options!
title: Nice clean watch faces with great options!
